title: Ballots; where voting machines are used
context: ยง15-14 Ballots; where voting machines are used. In all precincts in which voting machines are used sections 15-1 to 15-13 shall apply provided that the number and type of absentee ballots to be printed shall be determined at the discretion of the officer charged with printing and furnishing them. The officer may use reasonable facsimiles of the sample ballot used in voting machine precincts. [L 1975, c 36, pt of ยง3]
